name: Chainmail Armor
desc: Armor set made of chainmail

name: Large Shield
desc: shield made of metal

name: Leather Armor
desc: Armor set made of leather

name: Studded Leather Armor
desc: Armor set made of leather and small stud plates.

name: Platemail Armor
desc: Armor set made of solid metal plates

name: Robes
desc: Armor set made of cloth

name: Camping Kit
desc: Allows the party to rest until fully recovered.

name: Emerald
desc: Emerald Gem

name: Gold Ring
desc: Ring made of solid gold

name: Golden Goblet
desc: Golden Goblet

name: Lanterna History
desc: This is a complete History of Lanterna. You are very familiar with this book since you have studied it in school. Here are the main events...

name: Kendra's Ring
desc: Ring made of solid gold. It has Kendra's family name engraved on the side of the band.

name: Ring of Protection +1
desc: A ring with a shimmer of magic. Increases AC by one point.

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
desc: Ring made of solid gold that grants a 30% resistance to fire.

name: Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of minor wounds (+8 HP)

name: Extra Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of moderate wounds (+16 hp)

name: Spell Points Potion
desc: user regains some spell points (+20 SP)

name: Battle Axe
desc: Battle axe of standard construction

name: Crossbow
desc: crossbow made of common materials

name: Dagger
desc: small blade

name: Elvish Short Sword +1
desc: This magic weapon has a +1 enhancement bonus to attack and damage. It was forged and enchanted by the Western Elves during the early years of the world. It is known to give courage to those who wield the sword.

name: Fire Dagger
desc: dagger of standard construction that also causes an additional 1-2 point(s) of fire damage on a successful hit.

name: Flaming Long Sword
desc: Long blade of standard construction that also causes an additional 2-3 points of fire damage on a successful hit.

name: Hand Axe
desc: Hand axe of standard construction

name: Long Bow
desc: long bow constructed of common materials

name: Long Sword
desc: Long blade of standard construction

name: Mace
desc: Mace of standard construction

name: Short Bow
desc: short bow made of common materials

name: Short Sword
desc: a short sword constructed of standard but sound materials

name: Sling
desc: small sling made of common materials

name: Sling of Fire
desc: small sling made of common materials that adds 1 point of fire damage.

name: Spear
desc: Spear of standard construction

name: Vial of Poison
desc: This is a vial of poison, the same poison being used to pollute the river and making the Langdale people sick. You should probably keep this as evidence.

name: Ian's Letter
desc:
This letter was written yesterday by your brother, Ian.

"To my family and friends,

I have recovered well enough to leave this place and find my companions.  The Elder Elves, here in Lorenwaite, think I still need time to heal, but every day that goes by is a day that my friends may not survive.  I must try and find them.  I will return to Brinsby shortly, hopefully with our friends.

Ian"

name: Letter to the kobold king
desc:
This letter appears to have been written recently.

"...You have delayed long enough.  The time for you to carry out your orders is now.  I will be sending one of my loyal servants to give further instructions once you have completed the task at hand.

Z..."

name: Arrow
desc: Basic arrows of standard construction.

name: Stone
desc: Basic stone used by slings.

name: Stone of Fire
desc: Stone used by slings. These stones add fire damage.

name: Magic Amulet
desc: A test item for testing Conversations starting from item use

name: Magic Book
desc: A test item for testing Encounters starting from item use...this item is set to be destroyed after use.

name: Bolt
desc: Basic bolts of standard construction. Used with crossbows.

name: Amulet of Constitution +1
desc: An enchanted amulet that increases the wearer's constitution

name: Scroll of Stone to Flesh
desc: A one time use scroll that casts "Stone to Flesh".

name: Axin's Journal
desc:
This battered and slightly soggy book is the journal of the wizard Axin. 

Most of the journal is full of strident gibberish about how the other bandits don't take him seriously enough, the "ghastly food", and his continually rebutted attempts to bed a bandit called Maevenira.

However, the last pages recount Kirkmor's return to the camp, armed to the teeth with a large group of blood-thirsty mercenaries. Axin noted that the group was well funded and equipped.

name: Lennil's Dagger
desc: A particularly wicked dagger with an incredibly shap edge.

name: Old Key
desc: A very old metal key. It is slightly warped with age.

name: Halberd +1
desc: A halberd with a soft magical glow.

name: Druid Staff
desc: The Druid leader's staff.

name: Large Shield +2
desc: A large, enchanted shield.

name: Ring of Poison Resistance
desc: A thick steel ring that grants 30% reduction to poison damage.

name: Chainmail +2
desc: Armor set made of chainmail. It glows softly with an enchantment.

name: Iron Key
desc: A heavy iron key.

name: Robes of Resistance
desc: Armor set made of cloth. This set has the slight glow of magic, and provides 10% reduction to all damage.

name: Rope and climbing spikes
desc: A rope and climbing spikes.

name: Ancient Key
desc: An ancient, rusted key.

name: Ring of Magic Resistance
desc: This ring provides a 30% resistance to magical damage.

name: Staff of Power
desc: This ancient staff has lost some of its potency, but is still a fearsome and valuable weapon.

name: Rusty key
desc: A rusty key.

name: Leather Armor +1
desc: Armor set made of leather. This set glows with soft enchantment.

name: Axe of the Undying
desc: The blade to this axe is sharp and deadly.

name: Heavy Key
desc: A very heavy key.

name: Amulet of Strength +1
desc: An enchanted amulet that increases the wearer's strength

name: Long Key
desc: A very long key.

name: Bloodstained Key
desc: A bloody key.

name: Amulet of Constitution +2
desc: An enchanted amulet that increases the wearer's constitution

name: Circlet of Intellect +1
desc: A circlet of gold that provides a bonus to the wearer's intelligence.

name: Amulet of Dexterity +1
desc: An enchanted amulet that increases the wearer's dexterity

name: Mace +2
desc: An enchanted mace.

name: Worthless Trinkets
desc: The stash of trinkets you took from Lennil's hut. The trinkets are fakes, made from poor quality metals designed to look like gold. Lennil must have hidden his real stash somewhere else. These worthless items are clearly decoys.

name: Fake Druid Staff
desc: This looks like the Druid leader's staff, but it is a fake.

name: Ring of Protection +2
desc: A ring with a shimmer of magic. Increases AC by one point.

name: Holy Blade of the Elderin
desc: A gleaming two-handed sword.

name: Crypt Key
desc: A thin, bony key.

name: Bow of Belascarin
desc: A beautifully carved bow that has strong enchantments.

name: Dalamar's Key
desc: A key given to you by Dalamar.

name: Gate Key
desc: A key to a specific gate.

name: Foe Hammer
desc: A heavy, nasty magic hammer that does consistently high damage.

name: Green Orb Key
desc: A green orb key.

name: Red Orb Key
desc: A red orb key.

name: Crystal Plate Armor
desc: Armor set made of solid crystal.

name: Crystal Blade
desc: Long blade of pure crystal.

name: Crystal Shield
desc: A large crystal shield.

name: Amulet of Intelligence +2
desc: An enchanted amulet that increases the wearer's intelligence.

name: Greater Robes of Resistance
desc: Armor set made of cloth. This set has the slight glow of magic, and provides 20% reduction to all damage.

name: The Elderin Stone
desc: An Elderin Stone... a thing of great beauty.

name: Ominous Key
desc: An ancient key that feels cold to the touch.

name: Scroll of Demonic Vulnerability
desc: A one time use scroll that will greatly weaken a demon.

name: Ring of Protection +3
desc: A ring with a shimmer of magic. Increases AC by three points.

name: The Prince's Leather
desc: Armor set made of leather. This set glows with soft enchantment.

name: Amulet of Defence +2
desc: An enchanted amulet that increases the wearer's armor class by 2 and provides 20% resistance to normal damage.

name: The Shield of Merton Afflen
desc: A large, ornate shield. Engraved in the rim is the wording "the Shield of Merton Afflen"

name: Rations
desc: Some dried meat biscuits. They're probably tastier than they look.

name: Mace of Disruption
desc: The Mace of Disruption is a strange weapon. It exists in both the spirit and the temporal dimension, meaning that it can directly damage non-coporeal undead. Its grip and metal are warped and twisted under the strain of its tortured existence.

name: Spirit Arrow
desc: These translucent arrows exist in both the spirit and the temporal worlds.
